title: Transfer input file
body: Okay so i tried transfering the input file from live servers to the alpha client, but it doesnt seem to be working. is this action not supported yet?

replies.body:
I'm not sure what are you referring to. Are you having problems installing or patching the alpha? Have you tried the Hextech Repair Tool?
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=OYugMxvV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T20:22:42.964+0000)
>
> I'm not sure what are you referring to. Are you having problems installing or patching the alpha? Have you tried the Hextech Repair Tool?
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

NVM, i was able to transfer my input file. But I was doing so during a bot game (not custom) and as such was afk for a large portion (i had to quit the game multiple times for the changes to take effect) of it which caused me to be tagged by the leaver buster system even though i came back before the match ended.
